ModMetaData.name: LMC044.入墙式制冷器与通风孔
ModMetaData.author: Hanabishi
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Mod allows to place coolers and vents inside the walls. If you hate when raiders easily breaks your rooms (especially fridges) this mod is for you =) 这个MOD允许制冷器与通风孔直接放置与墙体上。 如果你曾经因为安装制冷器或者通风孔导致房间被破坏（特别是冷冻室），这个MOD就是为你定制的。 [Installation] Compatible with existing saves. Just place additional walls in coolers and vents positions to stop the air get through. 与现有存档兼容，但是记得在原有制冷器与通风孔的地方重新安装墙体，否则是漏的。。。。。。 [Uninstallation] All coolers and vents placed on the walls will be disassembled into components. 可以安全卸载，所有的制冷器与通风孔会被解体，归还建造材料。 汉化：jxb12306 合集地址：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html
